The Zhongshan Naluozhai Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the Naluo Village of Wangjiazai Town, in the Liupanshui City of Guizhou Province

operators: 贵州水城矿业股份有限公司
owners: 贵州水库矿业控股集团有限公司
web_search_companies.notes: Guizhou Shuicheng Mining Co Ltd operates the mine, which is fully owned by Guizhou Shuikuang Holding Group Co Ltd.
